A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEE/S, TO
CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, CALLING UPON THE ENERGY REGULATORY COMMISSION (ERC) AND MANILA ELECTRIC COMPANY (MERALCO), ON THE SUDDEN INCREASE IN ELECTRICITY RATES AND INTERRUPTIONS DURING THE ENHANCED COMMUNITY QUARANTINE AND GENERAL COMMUNITY QUARANTINE
